title: About
description: Join us for the "Annual Conference of ISMMACS and the International Conference on Differential Equations: Theory, Mathematical Modeling, and Scientific Computing," along with a Pre-conference Workshop on "Mathematical Modeling & Dynamical Systems: Computational Approaches and Research Horizons." This prestigious event will bring together leading scholars, researchers, and practitioners from around the globe to explore the latest advancements in the fields of differential equations and mathematical modeling. Scheduled for December 8â€“10, 2025, at DAU Gandhinagar, this conference provides a unique platform for knowledge sharing, idea exchange, and collaboration. Attendees will have the opportunity to engage in thought-provoking keynote sessions, attend specialized workshops, and participate in interactive discussions. The event will also provide an excellent opportunity to interact and network with the leading experts from around the world.
highlights: Expert-led keynote presentations from renowned speakers in the field.
A diverse range of sessions covering theoretical aspects, practical applications, and computational techniques.
Networking opportunities to connect with fellow researchers and industry professionals.
A showcase of cutting-edge research and innovative solutions in scientific computing.
